lines.content: This is a task manager bot named Azmuth. It allows the user to keep track of his/her tasks through the command line.
- [x] List all tasks in task list.
- [x] Mark and unmark a task as done.
- [x] Search for tasks with specific date.
1. Download and copy the jar file into an empty folder.
2. Open a command window or terminal for mac in that folder.
3. Run the command `java -jar duke.jar` in the same folder.
Adds a new todo task of name `<taskName>`.
`taskName: String` - name given to the todo task
New todo task is successfully added into the task list.
Added new todo task: play minecraft
You have 1 tasks in the list.
Adds a new deadline task of name `<taskName>` with date `<date>` and time `<time>`.
`taskName: String` - name given to the deadline
`date: String` - date of deadline in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`
`time: String` - time of deadline in the format `HH:MM`
New deadline task is successfully added into the task list.
Added new deadline task: download minecraft
You have 2 tasks in the list.
Adds a new event task of name `<taskName>` with date `<date>` and time `<time>`.
`taskName: String` - name given to the event
`date: String` - date of event in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`
`time: String` - time of event in the format `HH:MM`
New event task is successfully added into the task list.
You have 3 tasks in the list.
Lists out all tasks in the task list in index order.
Current task list is listed in order ot initial entry. Type, markings and any date/time are indicated.
Here is your list of tasks:
Marks the task of that index in the task list as done.
`taskNumber: Integer` - the index of the task as shown in the task list
Specified task of the index is marked in the task list, indicating that it is done.
play minecraft has been marked as done!
Unmarks the task of that index in the task list that was previously marked as done.
`taskNumber: Integer` - the index of the task as shown in the task list
Specified task of the index is unmarked in the task list, indicating that it is not done.
Deletes the task of that index from the task list.
`taskNumber: Integer` - the index of the task as shown in the task list
Specified task of the index is successfully deleted.
You have 2 tasks in the list.
Finds a matching tasks with a specified keyword in its name.
`keyword: String` - the keyword to match by
All tasks with task names with any instance of the specified keyword will be listed out.
Here are the matching results from your task list!
### `checkout <date>` - Find tasks on a specific date
Lists out deadlines or events on a specified date, if any.
`date: String` - date of to be searched in the format `YYYY-MM-DD`
All deadlines and events occurring on the specified date will be listed out.
Here are the corresponding deadlines and events!
Lists out all other commands that Azmuth recognises.
A list of recognised commands (truncated user guide) will be listed out to the user.
Here if a list of commands that I recognise!
Date format is 'yyyy-mm-dd' and Time format is 'hh:mm'
'list': Lists out tasks in index order
'mark <taskNumber>': Mark a certain task as done
'unmark <taskNumber>': Unmark a certain task that was done
'delete <taskNumber>': Delete the task from the list
'find <something>': Searches the task list to find matching task names'checkout <date>': Checkout what deadlines or events you have on  a specific date
Saves the task list and quits the program.
Current task list is saved to `data.txt` (will be created if missing), after which the program exits.
Bye and see you again soon!
- A ***data.txt*** file will be created in the same directory as the jar file to save the task list.

* A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
private static List<Task> tasks = new ArrayList<Task>();
* Adds a new todos task and returns a non-null string to be shown to the user if necessary.
* @param taskName A name or description given to the task.
* @param toPrint A boolean to indicate whether a non-null string needs to be returned to be shown to the user.
* @return A non-null string if success message needs to be shown to user, or null string if not needed.
public String addNewTodo(String taskName, boolean toPrint) {
return ("Added new todo task: " + taskName + "\n " + tasks.get(tasks.size() - 1).toString()
+ "\nYou have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list." + END_OF_LINE);
* Adds a new deadline task and returns a non-null string to be shown to the user if necessary.

public String addNewDeadline(String taskName, String toBeDoneBy, boolean toPrint) {
return ("Added new deadline task: " + taskName + "\n " + tasks.get(tasks.size() - 1).toString()
+ "\nYou have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list." + END_OF_LINE);

+ "\nYou have " + tasks.size() + " tasks in the list." + END_OF_LINE);

* Represents the command to manage the processing of a checkout command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Checks the command for a date to search, then searches for events and deadlines in the task list.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @return A list of tasks of that date if any exists.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalDateTimeException If no valid date is given.
public static String processCheckout(String command, TaskList taskList)
* Represents the command to manage the processing of a deadline command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Deconstructs the raw command into key phrases and checks them, then adds a new deadline to the task list.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @return Successful add message to the user.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalDeadlineFormatException If format of the deadline command is incorrect.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalDeadlineDateException If the indicated date in the command is invalid.
public static String processNewDeadline(String command, TaskList taskList)
* Represents the command to manage the processing of a delete command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Checks the targeted index to be deleted, then delete the corresponding task in the task list.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @return Successful or failed deletion message to user.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalDeleteIndexException If index is out of range or not an integer.
public static String processDelete(String command, TaskList taskList)
* Represents the command to manage the processing of an event command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Deconstructs the raw command into key phrases and checks them, then adds a new event to the task list.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @return Successful add message to the user.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalEventFormatException If format of the deadline command is incorrect.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalEventDateException If the indicated date in the command is invalid.
public static String processNewEvent(String command, TaskList taskList)
* Represents the command to manage the processing of a find command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Checks the command for a keyword to search, then searches for it in the task list.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @return A list of tasks with keyphrase if any exists.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalFindCommandException If no valid substring is given.
public static String processFind(String command, TaskList taskList)
* Represents the command to manage the processing of a marking command after it has been recognised by the parser.
* Checks if indicted mark or unmark index is valid, then marks the task accordingly.
* @param taskList A task manager that contains the list of tasks and other task list related methods.
* @param toMark A boolean such that true means to mark and false means to unmark.
* @return Successful mark or unmark message to the user.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalNoMarkIndexException If no valid integer index is indicated in the command.
public static String processMarking(String command, TaskList taskList, boolean toMark)

* Deconstructs the raw command into key phrases and checks them, then adds a new todos to the task list.

* @return Successful add message to the user.
* @throws DukeException.IllegalTodoException If there is no valid name for the new task.
public static String processNewTodo(String command, TaskList taskList)
